name: Beat Me!
description:
Beat Me! is a physics-based multiplayer party game with comical fantasy characters and surprising environments.

Fight it out against your friends playing locally and via the internet or find random enemies around the world!

Key Features:


  • 2 to 6 PLAYERS in either Local or Online Multiplayer.
  • Many fantasy characters with original skills and fighting styles.
  • Physics-Based Combat System.
  • 100+ Highly Interactive Levels.
  • Many Game Modes to choose from.
